snippet: The feminist author Gloria Steinem is leading a campaign to pressure Speaker Christine C. Quinn to allow a City Council vote on a bill that would require businesses to grant paid sick leave.
abstract: Feminist author Gloria Steinem is leading a campaign to pressure Speaker Christine C Quinn to allow a City Council vote on a bill that would require most employers to grant paid sick leave; Steinem has been a strong supporter of Quinn's mayoral ambitions, but says that it is conditional on her bringing the paid-sick-day bill to a vote.
lead_paragraph: The feminist author Gloria Steinem is leading a campaign to pressure Speaker Christine C. Quinn to allow a City Council vote on a bill that would require businesses to grant paid sick leave.

headline.seo: Steinem Pressures Quinn on Council Vote on Sick-Leave Bill
headline.main: Steinem Presses Quinn to Back Sick-Leave Bill
headline.print_headline: Steinem Presses Speaker To Back Sick-Leave Bill
